text: Python check if object is in list of objects
I have a list of objects in Python.
I then have another list of objects.
I want to go through the first list and see if any items appear in the second list.
I thought I could simply do

code:
for item1 in list1:
    for item2 in list2:
        if item1 == item2:
            print "item %s in both lists"

text: However this does not seem to work.
I have more attributes than this though so don't really want to do 1 big if statement comparing all the attributes if I don't have to.
Can anyone give me help or advise on what I can do to find the objects which appear in both lists.
